channel.title: mips on Christos Kaltsas's Webpage
channel.description: Recent content in mips on Christos Kaltsas's Webpage

item.title: MIPS Assembly
item.description: 🤖 MIPS 💼 Registers 🗣️ Instructions 🔢 Arithmetic 🤔 Logical 🚂 Data Transfer 🛣️ Conditional Branch ⚖️ Comparison 🦘 Unconditional Jump 🩲 System Calls 🔠 Assembly Directives ⚒️ Methodology 📞 Calling Conventions 💭 If Else 🤖 MIPS MIPS is often used for pedagogical purposes in universities because it has a clean and small implementation. Also, it is a stepping stone to learning other major assembly languages such as ARM.
